title: Forecasting Road Accidents

labels.name: usage exception
labels.description: Exception during a SSE function call from Qlik

body:
**Function**
Prophet

**Describe the bug**
I am trying to select the accident year , road name, region and then trying to execute the app but it is throwing the error. I am able to execute the script for the first time without any filters. but when I select the filter, it is throwing LS failed, Hessian reset and the error in Qlik app is ' Error, The operation was cancelled. 

**Environment:**
 - OS - Windows
 - Qlik Desktop
 - SSE Version- Latest
![forecastingerror](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54904434/94843479-5b0cf480-03e2-11eb-859e-c13d154c37b8.PNG)
![forecastingerror](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54904434/94843523-6cee9780-03e2-11eb-8d25-cbe61f76b8dd.PNG)
![QlikForecastingError](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54904434/94843524-6d872e00-03e2-11eb-9c10-16fa3db3bbcc.PNG)




**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
